name: The Adventures Of
description:
This is a journey into the depths of space. A captain forced to abandon ship forced to clone and sell of crew member to survive. Will this Captain survive to reach federation Space or will MomCorp finally deliver her Deadly hug. Find out next week on 

THE ADVENTURES OF …

Drag and Drop Crew members on to station for them to work their
